allCards.custom: SELECT cards.id, name, article, colorOption, cardColors.gradientStart, cardColors.gradientEnd, biometrics, strftime('%d.%m.%Y', timestamp) AS date, strftime('%H:%M', timestamp) AS time FROM cards JOIN cardColors ON cards.colorOption = cardColors.id

cardById.custom: SELECT cards.id, name, article, colorOption, cardColors.gradientStart, cardColors.gradientEnd, biometrics, strftime('%d.%m.%Y', timestamp) AS date, strftime('%H:%M', timestamp) AS time FROM cards JOIN cardColors ON cards.colorOption = cardColors.id WHERE cards.id = ?1
